entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
